thread.title: Our pick of the best fixed-rate savings bonds
thread.title_full: Our pick of the best fixed-rate savings bonds

author: Kyle Caldwell
title: Our pick of the best fixed-rate savings bonds
text: Savings Our pick of the best fixed-rate savings bonds Savers can earn up to 2.3pc with a two-year bond. Below, we look at the best rates for one, two, three, four and five years Savers who put their money into a fixed-rate bond will not be able to access their capital for the duration of the term Photo: Alamy By Kyle Caldwell
